00041 CSwordModuleInfo::CSwordModuleInfo( SWModule* module ) {
00042     m_module = module;
00043     m_searchResult.ClearList();
00044 
00045     if (backend()) {
00046         if (hasVersion() && (minimumSwordVersion() > SWVersion::currentVersion)) {
00047             qWarning("The module \"%s\" requires a newer Sword library. Please update to \"Sword %s\".", name().latin1(), (const char*)minimumSwordVersion());
00048         }
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 CSwordModuleInfo::CSwordModuleInfo( const CSwordModuleInfo& m ) {
00053     m_module = m.m_module;
00054     m_searchResult = m.m_searchResult;
00055 }

00057 
00059 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordModuleInfo::clone(){
00060     return new CSwordModuleInfo(*this);
00061 }
00062 
00063 CSwordModuleInfo::~CSwordModuleInfo(){
00064     m_searchResult.ClearList();
00065     m_module = 0; //the real Sword module is deleted by the backend
00066 }
00067 
00069 const CSwordModuleInfo::UnlockErrorCode CSwordModuleInfo::unlock( const QString& unlockKey ){
00070     CSwordModuleInfo::UnlockErrorCode   ret = CSwordModuleInfo::noError;
00071     SWConfig moduleConfig("");
00072     if ( backend()->moduleConfig(name(), moduleConfig) ) {
00073         moduleConfig[name().latin1()]["CipherKey"] = unlockKey.local8Bit(); 
00074         backend()->setCipherKey(name().latin1(), unlockKey.local8Bit());    
00075         (*backend()->getConfig()) += moduleConfig;
00076         (*backend()->getConfig())[name().latin1()]["CipherKey"] = moduleConfig[name().latin1()]["CipherKey"];
00077         moduleConfig.Save();
00078     }   
00079     else
00080         ret = CSwordModuleInfo::wrongUnlockKey;
00081     return ret;
00082 }
00083 
00085 CHTMLEntryDisplay* CSwordModuleInfo::getDisplay() const {
00086     return dynamic_cast<CHTMLEntryDisplay*>(m_module->Disp());
00087 }
00088 
00090 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::isLocked() {
00091     if (isEncrypted() && config(CipherKey).isEmpty())
00092         return true;
00093     return false;
00094 }
00095 
00097 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::isEncrypted() const {
00102     ConfigEntMap config = backend()->getConfig()->Sections.find( name().latin1() )->second;
00103     ConfigEntMap::iterator it = config.find("CipherKey");
00104     if (it != config.end())
00105         return true;
00106     return false;
00107 }
00108 
00109 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::hasVersion() const {
00110     const string version = (*backend()->getConfig())[name().latin1()]["Version"];
00111     return version.length();
00112 }

00114 
00116 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::search( const QString searchedText, const int searchOptions, ListKey scope, void (*percentUpdate)(char, void*) ) {
00117     int searchType = 0;
00118     int searchFlags = REG_ICASE;
00119     
00120     //work around Swords thread insafety for Bibles and Commentaries
00121     CSwordKey* key = CSwordKey::createInstance(this);
00122     SWKey* s = dynamic_cast<SWKey*>(key);
00123     m_module->SetKey(s);
00124     delete key;
00125     
00126     //setup variables required for Sword
00127     if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::caseSensitive)
00128         searchFlags = 0;
00129 
00130     if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::exactPhrase)
00131         searchType = -1; //exact phrase
00132     else if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::multipleWords)
00133         searchType = -2; //multiple words
00134     else if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::regExp)
00135         searchType = 0; //regexp matching
00136         
00137     SWKey* searchScope = 0;
00138     if ((searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::useLastResult) && m_searchResult.Count()) {
00139         searchScope = m_searchResult.clone();
00140         m_searchResult = m_module->Search(searchedText.utf8(), searchType, searchFlags, searchScope, 0, percentUpdate);
00141         delete searchScope;
00142     }
00143     else if (searchOptions & CSwordModuleSearch::useScope) {
00144         searchScope = &scope;       
00145         m_searchResult = m_module->Search(searchedText.utf8(), searchType, searchFlags, (type() != Lexicon) ? searchScope : 0, 0, percentUpdate);
00146     }
00147   else
00148     m_searchResult = m_module->Search(searchedText.utf8(), searchType, searchFlags, 0, 0, percentUpdate);
00149     return (m_searchResult.Count()>0);
00150 }
00151 
00153 ListKey& CSwordModuleInfo::searchResult(const ListKey* newResult) {
00154     if (newResult)
00155         m_searchResult.copyFrom( *newResult );  
00156     return m_searchResult;
00157 }
00158 
00160 void CSwordModuleInfo::clearSearchResult(){
00161     m_searchResult.ClearList();
00162 }
00163 
00165 void CSwordModuleInfo::interruptSearch(){
00166     m_module->terminateSearch = true;
00167 }

00170 const SWVersion CSwordModuleInfo::minimumSwordVersion(){
00171     return SWVersion( config(CSwordModuleInfo::MinimumSwordVersion).latin1() );
00172 }
00173 
00175 const QString CSwordModuleInfo::name() const {
00176     return QString::fromLatin1( module()->Name() );
00177 }
00180 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::isUnicode(){
00181     return (module()->isUnicode());
00182 }

00184 const QString CSwordModuleInfo::config( const CSwordModuleInfo::ConfigEntry entry) {
00185     switch (entry) {
00186         case AboutInformation:
00187         {
00188             QString about = QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("About"));
00189             if (!about.isEmpty()) { 
00190                 RTFHTML filter;
00191                 const int len = about.length()+600;
00192                 char dummy[len];
00193                 strcpy(dummy, about.local8Bit());
00194         
00195                 filter.ProcessText(dummy,len,0);
00196                 about = QString::fromLocal8Bit(dummy);
00197             }           
00198             return about;
00199         }
00200         
00201         case CipherKey: {
00202             return QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("CipherKey"));
00203         }
00204             
00205         case AbsoluteDataPath: {
00206             return QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("AbsoluteDataPath"));
00207         }
00208         case DataPath: {
00209             return QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("DataPath"));
00210         }           
00211         case Description:
00212             return QString::fromLocal8Bit(m_module->Description());
00213             
00214         case ModuleVersion: {
00215             return QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("Version"));
00216         }
00217             
00218         case MinimumSwordVersion:
00219         {
00220             QString version = QString::fromLatin1(m_module->getConfigEntry("MinimumVersion"));
00221             return !version.isEmpty() ? version : QString::fromLatin1("0.0");
00222         }
00223             
00224         default:
00225             return QString::null;
00226     }
00227 }
00228 
00230 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::has( const CSwordModuleInfo::Feature feature ){
00231     switch (feature) {
00232         case StrongsNumbers:
00233             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "StrongsNumber");
00234         case GreekDef:
00235             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "GreekDef");        
00236         case HebrewDef:
00237             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "HebrewDef");       
00238         case GreekParse:
00239             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "GreekParse");      
00240         case HebrewParse:
00241             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "HebrewParse");     
00242         case DailyDevotion:
00243             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "DailyDevotion");       
00244         case Glossary:
00245             return m_module->getConfig().has("Feature", "Glossary");        
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 const bool CSwordModuleInfo::has( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option ){
00250     //BAD workaround!
00251     
00252     if (m_module->getConfig().has("GlobalOptionFilter",QString::fromLatin1("GBF%1").arg(backend()->configOptionName(option)).latin1()))
00253         return true;
00254     if (m_module->getConfig().has("GlobalOptionFilter",QString::fromLatin1("ThML%1").arg(backend()->configOptionName(option)).latin1()))
00255         return true;
00256     return false;
00257 }
